jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
About Us
HFNE (Half Hull Not Empty ) is a mental health charity operating 

The Role
This is an exciting opportunity for a Junior Software Engineer to join a charity  working on the future of mental wellbeing.

Help us create simple, beautiful and technically excellent solutions to deliver the very best user experience.
In collaboration with the team, design, develop and test product features, and where they go wrong, help in fixing them.
Identify and evangelise new and improved ways of working.
Assist with builds, CI, deployments and infrastructure.
Create a culture of learning, helping, innovation and autonomy.



Requirements
We're looking for an engineer with some experience (~1 year), ideally someone who's learnt the basics of working in an engineering team on commercial projects.


The Stack
We're looking for someone with basic experience with most of our stack so they can have an impact from day one.
TypeScript/JavaScript
Electron, Node, Web
MongoDB, Postgres
React, Redux, Styled Components
Webpack
Jest, CircleCI
Serverless, AWS, Docker

You can see more about our brand here : https://www.halffullnotempty.co.uk/
